card1.title: Automated Data Processing
card1.description: Eliminate 80-90% of manual data entry. Our AI systems process permits, licenses, and citizen requests automatically, freeing your staff for meaningful work.

card2.title: Instant Report Generation
card2.description: Generate compliance reports, budget analyses, and performance metrics in hours instead of weeks. Real-time dashboards for informed decision-making.

card3.title: Regulatory Compliance
card3.description: Stay compliant automatically. Our systems track regulatory changes and ensure your processes meet all municipal, state, and federal requirements.

card4.title: Citizen Service Portal
card4.description: Modern self-service portals reduce call volume by 60%. Citizens can track requests, submit applications, and access services 24/7.

card5.title: Department Integration
card5.description: Break down data silos. Connect planning, finance, public works, and emergency services with unified data platforms.

card6.title: Staff Training & Support
card6.description: Comprehensive training ensures smooth adoption. Your team becomes proficient with new systems, maximizing ROI on digital transformation.
